message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first. I think it would be a great fit for your needs. I'm asking for $18,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $12,000 for it. Would you consider accepting this offer?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $18,000 is my bottom line. I know the value this product brings, and I'm confident it's worth the price. I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.
